remediation: A fix was pushed into the master branch but not yet published.
title: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion')

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion'). An attacker can cause the application to crash by providing malformed DER public-key data for an F(2^m) curve, where the polynomial's degree terms are not in strictly decreasing order.
